Title: Technium
Description: If not indicated otherwise, notes in this collection are quoted from Kevin Kelly's excellent book "What Technology Wants".

Title: political compass ‚õã
Description:
An essential tool for thinking about [Alignment at Large](https://www.are.na/welf-von-horen/alignment-at-large).

The axes wisdom/care and power/capacity seem to define the space of what we're looking for in the [top right quadrant ‚ó≥](https://www.are.na/welf-von-horen/top-right-quadrant): games worth playing that bring about successful coordination and win cultural evolution. 

It also describes the failure modes of 

[techno-optimism ‚ó∞](https://www.are.na/welf-von-horen/techno-optimism-rsxs48c1jty): it's immature/naive/dishonest about it's own externalities), 

[limbic capitalism ‚ó±](https://www.are.na/welf-von-horen/limbic-capitalism-ukq3evfh1om): it turns extractive capitalism on us, the ultimate race to the bottom, and 

the [activist/hippie/buddhism complex ‚ó≤](https://www.are.na/welf-von-horen/activist-hippie-buddhism-complex) that cares so much but isn't oriented towards winning.

Title: Alignment at Large
